@kai.tpb
Ok, your pc will not have any problem running the game and you also have the right version of the game.

You can also try 'running as administrator' or restart your pc after installing.

With 'new map' I meant 'new folder', an empty folder. You can extract/install the CloneDVD and these files anywhere on your hard drive. Make sure you follow all the instructions properly.
